en: And do not disgrace me on the Day they are [all] resurrected -
The Day when there will not benefit [anyone] wealth

ar: يَوْمَ لَا يَنفَعُ مَالٌ وَلَا بَنُونَ
en: The Day when there will not benefit [anyone] wealth or children

ar: إِلَّا مَنْ أَتَى اللَّهَ بِقَلْبٍ سَلِيمٍ
en: But only one who comes to Allah with a sound heart."
And Paradise will be brought near [that Day] to the righteous.
And Hellfire will be brought forth for the deviators,
And it will be said to them,
"Where are those you used to worship
Can they help you or help themselves?"
So they will be overturned into it [i.e., Hellfire],
So they will be overturned into it [i.e., Hellfire],
And the soldiers of Iblees, all together.
